title: Connecting to MySQL on AWS RDS using Node.js
description: Video tutorial demonstrating how to create a MySQL database hosted on Amazon RDS and connect to it using a Node.js and Express.js server

title: Promethus Property Management
description: A brochure website developed during my practicum to help promote my employer's property management company to potential clients.

title: the Coffee Grounds
description: A single page website for a fictional Cafe

title: Falling Voxels
description: Simple game demo where the player adds and remove voxels. Any voxels that are free floating will tumble to the ground.

title: User Database
description: A RESTful API that allows for CRUD operations on a user database. The API is an express app hosted by Heroku and the database is hosted by MongoDB Atlas.

title: Kana Quiz
description: A simple web application intended to help to users memorize the Japanese alphabet. Both hiragana and katana.

title: Tallycraft
description: A single page website created to share my mother's crafting hobby.

title: 3D Multiplayer Browser Game (Work in Progress)
description: A small game that connects to a persistent dedicated server hosted in the cloud. Player progress will be automaticall saved.
